channel.title: Wii or ps3?
channel.description:
Im getting the wii for christmas!(yipee!) I made this poll to see wich one is better.(but im not switching what im getting!) Because my bro said wii is better my cous said ps3 better and keeps going on and on! Please vote for wich one is better!
****** *JunkJ* ******

item.description:

Buy one off ebay for 1 mil.

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Well pulling a muscle moving your arm around the dam room…
Even when playing the baseball one when you swing hard as hell.(and pitching…Throw hard on that!)
Thats the only way you can get a homerun.
Boxing im swinging my arm just to hit a guy on a screen.(im swinging like in a real fight in real life)
My arm just started hurting alot.
I think those 2 are more realistic then the other ones!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Thabest wrote:

Why cant wii be friends, why cant psthrii be friends?

I’m getting sick and tired of all the nerds bickering over these game systems.

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:79, topic:28744”]Or his arm just hurts because hes a 10 year old who weighs 40 pounds at the most and it looks like he has tooth pics for arms… and he was only playing for like 20 minutes anyway…

YES, he over exagerates wayyy tooo much.[/quote]
I played it 5 hours straight, my arm isn’t hurting?

Read full topic

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @cow821 cow821
item.description:
@cow821 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:40, topic:28744”][quote author=juju link=topic=42389.msg527752#msg527752 date=1164533572]
g00dg0d: Oh no! It’s the GFX police! (Or should I say the fucktard police?) GFX don’t make the game good, idiot. 90% of the PS games will be about shooting people, rapping & robbing cars! Oh that sounds like such fun!

I’d rather play the games that Wii features: Boxing, when you’re playing on the Wii, you’re actually involved in the game, unlike with the PS3 you’re just sitting on your couch staring at the screen

jme_009: Woohoo, the marketing hype of PS3 has gotten to you!
[/quote]

You obviously haven’t taken your post into account.

Lets take a look at some games PS2 has, dance dance revolution. Tell me, HOW CAN YOU NOT BE INVOLVED IN THIS GAME?[/quote]Guitar hero, and the eye toy too, and also not to mention it has motion censor in the ps3 like the wii. And the wii dosn’t have rumble not exactly sure on that but havn’t heard anything about it. The 360 is the middle man right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Lol…
HD-DVD is just packing more in that small space. BluRay is making that space bigger, with more room for packing, later on.

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @Smegman Smegman
item.description:
@Smegman wrote:

Thabest:

I cant believe you guys are listening to the shit Sony is shoving down your throat. The Bluray doesn’t make that much of a difference just like Sega’s “Blast Processing”.

it doesnt… what does make a difference is now games have 10 times more room for graphics, maps, sound, etc

item.title: Wii or ps3?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

juju:

It’ll be funny if Bluray loses the format wars - it’ll turn out just like Sony’s other format “Betamax” - there’ll proberly be hardly any games developed if it does.

I read an article that if you mess with (opening, modifying, etc) your B-R player, Sony knows. Sony “spys” on your B-R player with some net connection.
B-R is slow, and way over-priced for something that isn’t even finished (“future plans” that they state just shows its unfinished).
Go HD-DVD!

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“junkj”]WII winning big time… so i guess its a good choice
Played over my cousins house.You can select things with the sixaxis controll…
instead of usin a anolog stick or controll pad.
And!! You gotta stand up for every game you play with that thing my arm hurt when i got home.
I recommend WII when i posted this topic click first vote was a WII.
Every vote counts!:D[/quote]
